parameter.name: createdAfter
parameter.description: Selects visitor activities that were created after the specified time.

parameter.name: createdBefore
parameter.description: Selects visitor activities that were created before the specified time.

parameter.name: idGreaterThan
parameter.description: Selects visitor activities with IDs greater than the specified integer.

parameter.name: idLessThan
parameter.description: Selects visitor activities with IDs less than the specified integer.

parameter.name: prospectOnly
parameter.description: Selects prospects based on whether they are assigned.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Selects prospects based on whether they are assigned to a specified user.

parameter.name: campaignId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by assets whose campaign matches the specified ID.

parameter.name: customUrlId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the custom redirect with the specified ID.

parameter.name: emailId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the email with the specified ID.

parameter.name: fileId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the file with the specified ID.

parameter.name: formId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the form with the specified ID.

parameter.name: formHandlerId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the form handler with the specified ID.

parameter.name: landingPageId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities generated by the landing page with the specified ID.

parameter.name: prospectId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities associated with the prospect with the specified ID.

parameter.name: visitorId
parameter.description: Selects only visitor activities associated with the visitor with the specified ID.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Specifies the number of results to be returned.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Specifies the first matching visitor to be returned in the query response.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: Specifies the field that should be used to sort the results of the query.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: Specifies the ordering to be used when sorting the results of the query.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Specifies the format to be used when returning the results of the query.
